content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I executed the command "curl https://developers.google.com/maps/gmp-get-started | grep -A 5 \\"Obtain an API key\\""" but received no output. I then tried to calculate the distance using a command that includes obtaining an API key, but the result returned an error message stating that an invalid API key was provided.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "calculate_distance.py", "args": {"code": "import googlemaps\\nfrom datetime import datetime\\n\\n# Define the API key\\nAPI_KEY = \'YOUR_API_KEY\'\\n\\n# Define the client\\ngmaps = googlemaps.Client(key=API_KEY)\\n\\n# Define the start and end points\\nstart = \\"Yellowstone National Park\\"\\nend = \\"Mount Washburn\\"\\n\\n# Define the mode of transportation\\nmode = \\"driving\\"\\n\\n# Define the departure time\\ndeparture_time = datetime.now()\\n\\n# Get the directions\\ndirections = gmaps.directions(start, end, mode=mode, departure_time=departure_time)\\n\\n# Get the distance and travel time\\ndistance = directions[0][\'legs\'][0][\'distance\'][\'text\']\\ntravel_time = directions[0][\'legs\'][0][\'duration\'][\'text\']\\n\\n# Print the distance and travel time\\nprint(\\"Distance: {}\\".format(distance))\\nprint(\\"Travel Time: {}\\".format(travel_time))\\n"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command calculate_distance.py returned: Unknown command 'calculate_distance.py'. Please refer to the 'COMMANDS' list for available commands and only respond in the specified JSON format.", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "calculate_distance.py", "args": {"code": "import googlemaps\\nfrom datetime import datetime\\n\\n# Define the API key\\nAPI_KEY = \'YOUR_API_KEY\'\\n\\n# Define the client\\ngmaps = googlemaps.Client(key=API_KEY)\\n\\n# Define the start and end points\\nstart = \\"Yellowstone National Park\\"\\nend = \\"Mount Washburn\\"\\n\\n# Define the mode of transportation\\nmode = \\"driving\\"\\n\\n# Define the departure time\\ndeparture_time = datetime.now()\\n\\n# Get the directions\\ndirections = gmaps.directions(start, end, mode=mode, departure_time=departure_time)\\n\\n# Get the distance and travel time\\ndistance = directions[0][\'legs\'][0][\'distance\'][\'text\']\\ntravel_time = directions[0][\'legs\'][0][\'duration\'][\'text\']\\n\\n# Print the distance and travel time\\nprint(\\"Distance: {}\\".format(distance))\\nprint(\\"Travel Time: {}\\".format(travel_time))\\n"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command calculate_distance.py returned: Unknown command 'calculate_distance.py'.
